通信协议测试

发送 :0x11 0x22 0x33 0x44 0x55 0x66 0x77 0x88 0x99
0F 00 00 E1 47 08 00 00 4D 8D B2 BF 27 28 04 12 00 00 E5 48 0B 00 09 00 11 22 33 44 55 66 77 88 99 
	11 00 00 E1 47 0A 00 00 4D 8D B2 BF 27 28 06 1E 03 

发送 :0x99 0x88
0F 00 00 E1 47 08 00 00 4D 8D B2 BF 27 28 04 0B 00 00 E5 48 04 00 02 00 99 88 
	11 00 00 E1 47 0A 00 00 4D 8D B2 BF 27 28 06 1E 03 

发送 :'9'
0F 00 00 E1 47 08 00 00 4D 8D B2 BF 27 28 04 0A 00 00 E5 48 03 00 01 00 39 
	11 00 00 E1 47 0A 00 00 4D 8D B2 BF 27 28 06 1E 03 


断开蓝牙连接
0F 00 00 E1 47 08 00 00 4D 8D B2 BF 27 28 04 
0F 00 00 E1 47 08 00 00 4D 8D B2 BF 27 28 01 
0F 00 00 E5 44 08 00 00 4D 8D B2 BF 27 28 02 

0F 00 00 E1 47 08 00 00 4D 8D B2 BF 27 28 01 
0F 00 00 E5 44 08 00 00 4D 8D B2 BF 27 28 02 




连接蓝牙

10 00 00 E1 55 09 00 4D 8D B2 BF 27 28 0C 02 5A 
08 00 00 E1 93 01 00 00 
0F 00 00 E1 47 08 00 00 4D 8D B2 BF 27 28 00 
1A 00 00 E5 43 13 00 00 4D 8D B2 BF 27 28 1F 02 09 47 61 6C 61 78 79 20 53 36 
0C 00 00 E1 7D 05 00 30 03 00 01 00 

10 00 00 E1 55 09 00 4D 8D B2 BF 27 28 0C 02 5A 
08 00 00 E1 93 01 00 00 
0F 00 00 E1 47 08 00 00 4D 8D B2 BF 27 28 00 
0F 00 00 E1 47 08 00 00 4D 8D B2 BF 27 28 01

0F 00 00 E1 47 08 00 00 4D 8D B2 BF 27 28 01
